text: Lisotem approaches the unknown female aristocrat.

title: Alvart
text: Alvart of Alquart, future archduchess of the Alquart realm.
The one thing to catch Lisotem's attention is the revolver holster strapped to her thigh.

title: Lisotem
text: You know, you're the first lady I've seen with this kind of self-defence.

title: Alvart
text: And it can't be used for offence? What's wrong with a woman having a gun?

title: Lisotem
text: It's more about the fact that I have yet to see a single person use gunpowder technology until now.

title: Alvart
text: Everyone has used magic for centuries at this point. With the advancements in the world, why not go for a change?

title: Lisotem
text: I doubt your small handgun would put a dent in someone's defence like Cherminon over there.
